summary: Do you feel guilty for using the console? Now you have to pay for it.
descriptionHtml:
This mod requires SKSE - BETA version or higher: [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/beta/skse_1_06_01.7z]link[/url]. It will not work if you don\'t get this particular version.

NEW IN 2.0:
Opening the console by itself won\\\'t do anything - OKAY for mod testing  
Adding gold via console will damage your health, stamina and magicka by 5 times the amount you added. 100 gold = 500 health, stamina, and magicka.  
Adding an item will make you lose 2 times its value + your level. A weapon which costs 200 gold with a character level 80 = 400 + 80 = 480 gold coins removed from your inventory.

OLD 1.0 VERSION:
This simple mod makes you pay 50 gold coins for each time you open the console.
You could also avoid using it but what the hell! Some people here are too lazy and prefer downloading a mod that punishes them.
author: Sagittarius22

files.name: Expensive Console Menu
files.changelogHtml:
Opening the console by itself won\'t do anything - OKAY for mod testing
Adding gold via console will damage your health, stamina and magicka by 5 times the amount you added. 100 gold = 500 health, stamina, and magicka.
Adding an item will make you lose 2 times its value + your level. A weapon which costs 200 gold with a character level 80 = 400 + 80 = 480 gold coins removed from your inventory.
